verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Holy, holy, holy! Lord God Almighty! Early in the morning our song shall rise to thee Holy, holy, holy!Â Merciful and mighty God in three persons, Blessed Trinity!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Holy, holy, holy! All the saints adore Thee Casting down their golden crowns around the glassy sea Cherubim and seraphim falling down before Thee Which wert, and art, and evermore shalt be.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Holy, holy, holy! Though the darkness hide Thee, Though the eye of sinful man Thy glory may not see Only Thou art holy; there is none beside Thee Perfect in power, in love and purity.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Holy, holy, holy! Lord God Almighty! All Thy works shall praise Thy name In earth, and sky, and sea Holy, holy, holy! Merciful and mighty! God in three persons, Blessed Trinity!{/lang-eng}
